name: Turn Right (itch)
description:
Turn Right:

Turn right is a LEGO NINJAGO themed game where you control a ship on a never ending road. The road gets procedurally generated and is different every time.

There are most likely some bugs in the game, but please let me know if you find any!

the game was made in 2 days.

Controls:

SPACE - Turn

---Created by Zyger---
